entries.name: close()
entries.desc: Closes the GzipFile object. This method calls close method of the associated IO object. Returns the associated IO object.

entries.name: comment()
entries.desc: Returns comments recorded in the gzip file header, or nil if the comments is not present.

entries.name: crc()
entries.desc: Returns CRC value of the uncompressed data.

entries.name: finish()
entries.desc: Closes the GzipFile object. Unlike #close, this method never calls the close method of the associated IO object. Returns the associated IO object.

entries.name: mtime()
entries.desc: Returns last modification time recorded in the gzip file header.

entries.name: orig_name()
entries.desc: Returns original filename recorded in the gzip file header, or nil if original filename is not present.

entries.name: os_code()
entries.desc: Returns OS code number recorded in the gzip file header.

entries.name: sync = flagclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Same as IO.  If flag is true, the associated IO object must respond to the flush method.  While sync mode is true, the compression ratio decreases sharply.
